description:
The Akudarma Trio head to the Mito Domain in 1697 to find Mito Mitsukuni, the star of the popular period drama, “Mito Komon.” They find him enjoying some gyoza when NTV announcer Mito-chan somehow appears. Apparently she showed up to do a gourmet report in that era. Tokio and Calen also get involved and they have a ramen-making contest?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mito Koumon to Nihon Terebi Miura-ana no Bikkuri Dokkuri na Kankei to wa!?
What`s Mito Komon`s Super Surprising Connection with NTV Announcer Miura Asami?!
水戸黄門と日本テレビ水卜アナのビックリドッキリな関係とは!?
